name: Midnight Bowling
description: Plunge directly into the trendy and electric atmosphere of Midnight Bowling! With awesome playing sensations, prepare for ultra-fun gaming thanks to a new physics engine that lets you control your throws precisely and easily with your Wii Remote controller and make spectacular spins that will impress your opponents! Face up to three friends in the fun party mode, where your playing abilities will be put to the test! Whatever your level, launch yourself into the immersive career mode, where you will play in the trendiest bowling spots of the planet against charismatic characters that will give you a run for your money!
